questions.quote: Jerry, I felt like a straight man in some horrible sketch. He was riffing! Riffing! On my pain!
I mean, who has a funeral on a Wednesday? That's what I want to know. I mean, it's the championship, I'm hitting everything.
I really admire actors, you know. It's just such an incredible skill.
Excuse me, uh, I don't mean to cause any trouble here, but George, if you take it, can I take your place?
I love this place. You know, Carl and I come here all the time.
Robin, listen to me. The most amazing thing has happened. Kramer has opened my eyes. I think I've changed.
Yeah I gotta get Testikov on tape. If this woman ends up in the "New England Journal Of Medicine" I'm not gonna pay for it.
Jerry, do you know what they do to dogs at the pound? They keep them there for a week and then if nobody claims them, they kill them.
Frankly I am shocked that you would ask such a question  of me, that you would think - the only surprise is how you could even think of that. That's what you were seeing.
You got bit by a strange dog and you didn't get a rabies shot?
